bibl.title: Ptolemaic Sunset: Boys' Rites of Passage on Late Hellenistic Geronisos.
bibl.note: Refers to Ptolemaic ostraka found during the excavations of a temple (they will be published by Roger S. Bagnall), fragments of limestone plaques and inscribed sherds.

bibl.title: From Evagoras I to the Ptolemies: The Transition from the Classical to the Hellenistic Period in Cyprus. Proceedings of the International Archaeological Conference, Nicosia, 29-30 November 2002.

bibl.seg: Connelly Joan Breton, Ptolemaic Sunset: Boys' Rites of Passage on Late Hellenistic Geronisos.

Pavlos Flourentzos (Ed.), From Evagoras I to the Ptolemies: The Transition from the Classical to the Hellenistic Period in Cyprus. Proceedings of the International Archaeological Conference, Nicosia, 29-30 November 2002 (Nicosia, 2007) pp. 35-51, figg.
Refers to Ptolemaic ostraka found during the excavations of a temple (they will be published by Roger S. Bagnall), fragments of limestone plaques and inscribed sherds.
